actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to permit amounts in State unemployment compensation trust funds to be used for purposes of encouraging employment through payments to employers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to allow amounts in State unemployment compensation trust funds to be used in State programs for payments to employers who hire specified categories of unemployed individuals.

titles.title: A bill to permit amounts in State unemployment compensation trust funds to be used for purposes of encouraging employment through payments to employers.
